mapper.insert: insert into t_define_nicknm (nick_seq, nick_nm, nick_img, work_seq, nick_comment, del_yn, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, file_uuid) values (#{nickSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uptDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_define_nicknm set nick_nm = #{nickNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_img = #{nickImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_seq = #{workSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nick_comment = #{nickComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_yn = #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_seq = #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_dt = now(), file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where nick_seq = #{nickSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select nick_seq, nick_nm, nick_img, work_seq, nick_comment, del_yn, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, file_uuid from t_define_nicknm where nick_seq = #{nickSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select nick_seq, nick_nm, nick_img, work_seq, nick_comment, del_yn, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, file_uuid from t_define_nicknm

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS rowNum ,a.nick_seq ,a.nick_nm ,a.nick_comment ,(CASE WHEN a.file_uuid is not NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS file_uuid ,(SELECT work_nm FROM t_define_work WHERE nick_seq = a.nick_seq and DEL_YN = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y') as work_nm FROM t_define_nicknm a WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY nick_seq DESC

SELECT a.nick_seq ,a.nick_nm ,a.nick_comment ,a.del_yn ,ins_dt ,upt_dt ,a.file_uuid ,(SELECT file_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as fileNm ,(SELECT file_save_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as fileSaveNm ,(SELECT work_nm FROM t_define_work WHERE nick_seq = a.nick_seq and DEL_YN = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y') as workNm FROM t_define_nicknm a WHERE 1=1 AND nick_seq = ${nickSeq}
